Articles.Content:
2) An urgent meeting is called to discuss who is to blame for:

a) the existence of a nuclear reactor at a rocket launch site

b) designing said reactor to be dependent on an Internet connection
3) it was blamed on the poor management of Mortimer Kerman
4 And Mortimer was sent to the reactor to check.
1: The spaceship TotallyNotGonnaExplode 13 was approaching Jool.

2 But while it was flying, R&D developed warp tech and built another jool exploration ship that uses alcubirre drive. And the warp ship uses 3 minutes to reach jool. Poor TotallyNotGonnaExplode 13, it uses 2 years to reach jool.
3. The confused crew attempts to contact the warpship, but there is no response.
4 They soon found out that the warp ship uses a better communication protocol.
1: The Coyote was just about to catch the road runner.
2 But the road runner fires 4 anti-tank missiles.
3: But then the Heart of Gold suddenly appears and its unprobability engine turns the anti-tank missiles into flowers.

4) The flowers fall from a great height with a satisfying whistling sound that drops in pitch as they near the bottom of the ravine. They crash to the desert floor and a perfectly doughnut-shaped cloud of dust spreads out from the impact location. Some onlookers claim they could hear a voice inexplicably saying "Oh no, not again."
1) Jeb sat on his couch watching the television, when he suddenly realized that he forgot to take out the trash.
2) The trash has been there for so long it has evolved into a sentient life form.

3 But it's radioactive waste. Jeb throw it into a spent fuel pool. 

Edited December 31, 2022 by Abel Military Services

4: The sentient radioactive trash gets angry at Jeb and decides to exact revenge on him by [REDACTED] the [DATA EXPUNGED] into [REDACTED]

Edited December 31, 2022 by Maria Sirona
Added "on him"
1 Jeb recieved his new year gift.
2: It was an antiviolence field. Anybody who promotes violence towards any Kerbal, simply dissappears in a puff of logic.

3 so jeb use that to get the Kobel Prize

Edited January 2, 2023 by Abel Military Services
4: All rocket launches were a success from then on.
1 the struts are no longer unbreakable in KSP2
2) The community review bombs the game on Steam
3 then they increased the ion engine's thrust.
4: But no one knows because they left when the game bombed.
1 Dell Conagher invented some sort of intelligent turret.
2) The turret is self aware. It wants to make everyone friends and spends it's time encouraging others to make peace with one another.
